title: Let’s Share
detail_text: <:th_ch0107/>Hnn.... *Achoo*!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0006/>Are you okay?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0107/>It’s fine zura. Maru wishes Maru had worn more layers~. Maru didn’t think Tokyo would be this cold zura....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0006/>It’s hard to decide what to wear around this time of the year. I feel like it’s too early to wear a midwinter coat, but an autumn coat would be too cold....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0107/>Maru’s knitted coat might be a mistake too~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0006/>Hey, get a little bit closer to me. Let’s both use my stole.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0107/>Eeeh!? Won’t you be cold then, Maki-chan?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0006/>That’s why I’m telling you to get closer. If we huddle up, we won’t be that cold, and each of us can use half of the stole.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0107/>Then.... Fuaaah, it’s so warm~. Maru never knew that not having your neck exposed to the winds can be so much warmer~! Also.... let’s get some hot chocolate from that food truck over there! Maru will treat you as thanks for sharing this stole!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0006/>I guess it can’t be helped. But we’re supposed to eat pancakes after this, right? Let’s also share the chocolate so we won’t be full.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
